level.heading: Penalty.
level.text: Any person who knowingly and willfully violates any rule or regulation prescribed under this chapter shall be guilty of a misdemeanor, and, upon conviction thereof, shall be fined not more than $500 or imprisoned not more than 6 months, or both.

level.heading: CREDIT(S)
level.text: (June 29, 1940, ch. 444, ยง 5; as added May 15, 1947, 61 Stat. 94, ch. 62.)
